thag5.11:1.3: I’ve seen the Blessed One myself,
thag5.11:1.4: and even stayed together with him.
thag5.11:2.2: spent much of the night in the open;
thag5.11:2.3: then he, who is so skilled in meditation,
thag5.11:3.3: like a lion in a rocky cave,
thag5.11:3.4: with fear and dread given up.
thag5.11:4.2: Soṇa, a disciple of the Buddha,
thag5.11:5.1: When he has completely understood <j>the five aggregates,
